instruction: Write a announcement tweet for medium.com readers about the new blogpost on "Open Assistant is open source ChatGPT that you don't wanna miss out"
output:
"Attention all #AI enthusiasts and developers! 🚀 We're excited to announce the launch of our new blogpost on "Open Assistant: The Open Source ChatGPT You Don't Want to Miss Out On"! 📄

In this post, we'll be exploring the world of Open Assistant, an open-source alternative to ChatGPT that you can customize and use for your own projects. 💻

We'll delve into the features and capabilities of Open Assistant, and how it can be used to create intelligent chatbots, virtual assistants, and more. 🤖

So, whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting out, this blogpost is a must-read for anyone interested in the world of AI and machine learning. 💡

Head over to our blog now to read the full post and start exploring the possibilities of Open Assistant! 👉 https://medium.com/open-assistant"
